  Destructor smiled as he saw the preds enter his base on the security 
screen..."I will make sure all have rooms. From now on all of you horsemen 
will sleep on the floor.." He sent the coordinates of each of the bots 
quaters to them. "There now on to other things" he walked into the lab and 
put his hand on Kit Kat's shoulder.."So any news on our little fallen friend 
here?"
